definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: This is a foreign exchange trader direct experience.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個外匯交易的直接經驗。

sentences.english: At least 3 years facility related work experience.
sentences.chinese: 至少3年廠務相關的工作經驗。

sentences.english: The manufacturing of wood veneers takes great skill as well as experience.
sentences.chinese: 木材的單板生產需要很大的技巧，以及經驗。

sentences.english: "We wanted to take that experience back to Europe, " Gentz said.
sentences.chinese: “我們想要把這些經驗帶回歐洲，”根茨說。

sentences.english: If a new strategy works, then it will be adopted and further routinized as a rule of thumb.
sentences.chinese: 如果新辦法行得通，以後就會沿用而成爲經驗法則。

sentences.english: Make a self-development plan to acquire the skills and experiences you need.
sentences.chinese: 制定一個獲取技能和經驗的自我提升計劃。

sentences.english: Objective To review the experience of diagnosis and surgical treatment for giant tumor of mediastinum.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討巨大縱隔腫瘤的診斷和外科治療經驗。

sentences.english: Depend on intuition and experience, he ases if the key that found baseball of the gold dollar that defeat solution.
sentences.chinese: 憑藉直覺和經驗，他彷彿找到了破解金元棒球的鑰匙。

sentences.english: Kenai residents know firsthand the challenges that follow a natural disaster.
sentences.chinese: 肯奈居民從親身經驗知道天災之後出現的困難。

sentences.english: This experience is useful to appreciate the beauty of languages in the world.
sentences.chinese: 這是非常有用的經驗體會到，在世界語言之美。

sentences.english: Tunisia should learn from China's experiences in developing its country.
sentences.chinese: 中國的治國經驗對突尼斯有很好的借鑑作用。

sentences.english: I started to realize that it's the field that I have the most experience in.
sentences.chinese: 我開始發覺這是我經驗最充足的一行。

sentences.english: And right in-between thinking and doing, I would say, there is experience.
sentences.chinese: 正處於思想和行爲之間的，我會說，是經驗。

sentences.english: Stress your experience and your energy.
Unlike the rest of China, Hong Kong also has a lot of experience organizing horse races.
sentences.chinese: 不像中國其他地區，香港還有許多組織賽馬的經驗。

sentences.english: Peoplewho have working experience in hotel.
sentences.chinese: 具有酒店工作經驗者優先考慮。

definition: practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
